Package org.forgerock.openidm.util

package org.forgerock.openidm.util
OpenIDM utility classes

This package defines a number of utility classes for use in OpenIDM

  • Class
    Description
    Accessor<T>
    A simple accessor of an object instance.
    CertUtil
    Utilities for generating, serializing, and deserializing Certificates.
    ConfigMacroUtil
     
    ContextUtil
     
    CryptoUtil
    This utility helps obfuscate passwords to prevent casual observation.
    DateUtil
    Manages timestamp strings in ISO8601 format
    DurationStatistics
    Thread-safe statistics class for time-durations, that calculates accurate count, min, and max values, and approximate mean and standard-deviation, with minimal memory consumption and low-latency under thread-contention.
    FileUtil
    The FileUtil class contains common methods to read text files.
    HeaderUtil
    Additional HTTP Header utilities, not provided by HeaderUtil.
    JettyPropertyUtil
    Utility for handling Jetty configuration properties, including properties that may need to be encrypted/obfuscated, and/or may be encrypted/obfuscated
    JsonUtil
     
    LogUtil
     
    LogUtil.LogLevel
     
    NaturalOrderComparator
     
    RelationshipUtil
    Utilities methods and fields for managed object relationships.
    RequestUtil
    Utility methods for helping build/manipulate CREST request objects.
    ResourceMessages
    This file contains localizable message descriptors having the resource name org.forgerock.openidm.util.resource.
    ResourceUtil
    Resource utilities.
    Script
    This class wraps a ScriptEntry object representing a script stored in the ScriptRegistry and provides a method for executing the script with a given Context and scope variables.
    Scripts
    A singleton utility class that provides static methods for retrieving scripts from the ScriptRegistry.
    Utils
    Utility methods.
